London. Airports
London has five main airports.
Luton
London City Airport, 9.5 kilometres east of London, accessible by metro and train.
Stansted
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Cum, dolores!
Heathrow
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, doloremque.
Gatwick
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel, molestiae.
